title: Necrotic City
description: What would you do if you realized that the laws you enforce do little more than contribute to the suffering of the people you were created to protect?  In a dying city wracked by corruption and civil unrest, Adrian is about to make a discovery that will test his allegiance and alter his life forever. It’s said that every broken world needs a hero. Will this hero wind up as broken as the dying city he’s sworn to protect?
author: Leland Lydecker
